descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: (17/12/2012) v1.1 + Alternative v1.1

*** Alternative v1.1 will have slightly scaled back stats. 

UPDATE: (15/12/2012) v1.1

*** I took off a little bit of shine in the wrong place and slightly downscaled the normal map intensity to make it more elegant.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey guys,

You can find the Bronze Greatsword in the Steel Smithing Category.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

REQUIREMENTS:
* Steel Smithing /
* Steek Ingot
* Corundum Ingot /
* Leather Strips /
* Ale (Because everyone needs a drink after a hard day\'s blacksmithing)

***------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------***
FEATURES: Alternative V1.1 (Comparison: Vanilla Steel Greatsword Stats)
* Weight: 9% heavier
* Attack:  20% stronger
* Crit: 0% better
* Speed: 5% faster

FEATURES: V1.1 (Comparison: Vanilla Steel Greatsword Stats)
* Weight: 13% heavier
* Attack:  36% stronger
* Crit: 12% better
* Speed: 10% faster
author: Elgar2389
